text: Johanna Hiedler or Johanna Hüttler (19 January 1830 – 8 February 1906) was the mother of Klara Hitler and grandmother of Adolf Hitler. She lived in Waldviertel. ==References== Category:1830 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Austrian Roman Catholics Category:Hitler family Category:People from Lower Austria
title: Johanna Hiedler
